name: Teach.Me Mobile application for finding a tutor
description: Mobile application for finding a tutor. On the main page is a 30 second video presentation of the people, which will help you find the best teacher on the topic that interests you. Swipe to the right to add the lessons from the person to your library and you can watch video tutorials from people from all over the world. And if you swipe to the left, you may miss a skill that would be useful to you. Add people from all over the world and communicate without borders with fans of their craft.
